game.name: Zombie Crowd
game.description:
Imagine a world where you are alone and have become a zombie! Now you have decided to walk around the city, seek another person, kill and suck their blood and convince them to become a member of your group. Is it not pretty exciting? That is the gameplay of this brand new action-packed challenge. So, what are you waiting for? Join Zombie Crowd and get ready to control a huge group of blood-thirsty monsters! This zombie game is completely different from what you tried out previously. 
No, you are not going to play the role of a hero who fights hard against the undeads. But, you are also playing a zombie role in this cool html5 online game. The best part is that you are blessed with the power that can allow you to control the whole world of zombies. Come forward and spread the pestilence further and increase your zombie group! Get ready to use your collective brain to overcome the group of other monsters! Find defenseless people and attack them to get them to your side! There is more to get when you play this game online without download. 
Spread evil and negativity all over the city in this one of the best zombie games for kids! Do not think twice and destroy the enemy hord before they attack at you. Try to get more zombies in your clan to make your group stronger and destroy your enemy zombies with much ease! Your prey will turn into a zombie as you touch him. Keep adding more zombies to your group and increasing your points through which you can buy new upgrades! Explore multiple zombies, restore life button and an awesome map for tracking zombies and humans and become a zombie king in this unique multiplayer game!
